[Adblock Plus 2.7]
! Version: 201608
! Title: AeList (Adblock Edge)
! Last modified: 13 Sep 2016 13:00 UTC
! Expires: 3 days (update frequency)
! Homepage: https://github.com/bopoh13/docs/tree/master/vendor/firefox/
! Please report any unblocked tracking or problems.
! https://adblockplus.org/filter-cheatsheet/# Quick Help
!
!--------------------General tracking systems-----------------------------------!
/advertising.$~object-subrequest
/adriver.$~object-subrequest
.adriver.$~object-subrequest
/googleads.$~object-subrequest
/pagead2.$~object-subrequest
||an.yandex.
||awaps.yandex.
||bs.yandex.
||googleadservices.
||kiks.yandex.
||mc.yandex.
||st.yandexadexchange.
||yabs.yandex.
||yastatic.*/daas/
||youtube.com/api/stats/*
||avito.ru/s/a/*/dfp/px.js
||yandex.*/clck/$~ping
@@||an.yandex.ru^$image,script,domain=avito.ru
!--------------------Third-party tracking domains-------------------------------!
||adfox.ru^$third-party
||advombat.ru^$third-party
||digitaltarget.ru^$third-party
||doubleclick.net^$third-party
||marketgid.com^$third-party,~popup,popup
||mxtads.com^$third-party
||tns-counter.ru^$third-party
@@||adfox.ru^$image,script,domain=auto.ru|avito.ru|mts.ru
|http://*.doublepimp.com/*&curl=$popup,third-party,domain=pornhub.com|redtube.com
!--------------------Individual importunate systems-----------------------------!
||code.jivosite.com/script/$third-party
||leadobur.com/widget/$third-party
||leetero.ru^$third-party
||cs15.livetex.ru/js/$third-party
||clients.streamwood.ru^$third-party
||uptocall.com/widget/$third-party
||uptolike.com/widgets/$third-party
pravoved.ru## div.leadAside
!--------------------Social networking links------------------------------------!
aliexpress.com## div.ui-fixed-panel-shares
autoburn.ru## strong.text-muted, strong.text-muted ~ span
disk.yandex.ru## div.nb-share
drive2.ru## span.c-share
geektimes.ru,habrahabr.ru## div#vk_groups, div#facebook_like_box, div.twitter_stream, ul.post-share
lenta.ru## div.b-socials__container
life.ru## div.social-share__counter, div.social-share__icons
livejournal.com## div.lj-like, li.share
ria.ru## div.b-social-userbar__expand-button, div.b-social-userbar__soc-container, div.b-social-userbar__expand-block
tass.ru## div.b-share
youtube.com## div#share-services-container
!--------------------Advertising blocks and scripts-----------------------------!
## iframe:not([src*="/www.youtube.com/"]):not([src*="/player.vimeo.com/"]):not(src*="/www.slideshare.net/"])
## div[id*="ads"], div[id*="adv"], div[id*="banner"]
## div[class*="adv"]
## div[class*="banner"], div[class*="promo"]
## span[class*="promo"]
## div[id$="underline"], div[class^="adblock"], div[class^="adsbygoogle"]
drive2.ru## div#side-dv-pinned, div.js-recommendations.c-block
drive2.ru## div.c-block > div[class^="c-dv"], div.c-block > div[class^="c-dv"] + div, div.c-block > div.c-block__fake-gap
livejournal.com## div.lj-recommended, div.b-discoverytimes-wrapper
pornhub.com,redtube.com## div[style^="display:"][style*="block"], div.footerWrapper
! Auto.ru
auto.ru## div[style^="display: block !important"]
auto.ru## table.listing-table > tbody[class*="-special-table"], table.listing-table > tbody[class*="-table-tgb"], table.listing-table > tbody[class$="fixed"]
! Google
google.com,google.ru## div.gb_ga
google.com,google.ru## #extrares, .pdp-psy, #pdp-psy
translate.google.com,translate.google.ru## div.gb_xc, div.gb_wc, div.gb_zc
! Mail.ru News
news.mail.ru## div.box_collapse
! Yandex
## div#ya-share, div.ya-share2, div > yatag
yandex.ru## i.b-counter + div[class~="dist-popup"], i.b-counter + iframe + div[class~="dist-popup"]
yandex.ru## div.content__left > div[class~="head-stripe"]
yandex.ru## div.content__left > ul[class~="serp-list"] > div:first-child, div[class~="footer-stripe"]
yandex.ru## div.related, div.scroll-spy, div[id$="teaser"][class~="i-bem"]
yandex.ru## .serp-item > div.organic > h2:not([class$="title"]), .serp-item > div.organic > h2:not([class$="title"]) ~ div
yandex.ru## li[class^="serp-item "]:not([class*="adresa"]):not([class*="forum"]):not([class*="image-stats"]):not([class*="z-maps"]):not([class*="z-market"])
! Yandex Images
yandex.ru## div.page-layout__column_type_content.page-layout__column > div[class~="dist"]
yandex.ru## div.incut__wrapper_footer_yes.incut__wrapper
! Yandex Maps
yandex.ru## div[data-reactid] > div[style^="display:"][style*="block"]
yandex.ru## div.search-snippet-view > a[target="_blank"]
! Yandex News
news.yandex.ru## h3.title[id^="title"], div.page-content__left > span, div.page-content__right > span
news.yandex.ru## div.page-content__left > div[-abp-properties="display: block !important;"]
news.yandex.ru## div.page-content__right > div[-abp-properties="display: block !important;"]
! Yandex Video
yandex.ru## div[id^="dist"]
! Habrahabr
geektimes.ru,habrahabr.ru## div.similar-posts, div.column-wrapper_bordered, div.xyz_wrapper
geektimes.ru## .post__body_full.post__body > .html_format.content > table, a[href="https://dronk.ru/"] ~ br
geektimes.ru## .post__body_full.post__body > .html_format.content > a[href="https://dronk.ru/"]:last-of-type > img
!--------------------Cosmetic fixes page layout---------------------------------!
2gis.ru## div.noResults__googletag
drive2.ru## div.g-column-wide > div:not(.offer) > div.c-block:not([class*="c-block-"])
kinozal.me,kinozal.tv## div.menu > div.bx2_0:nth-last-child(2)
livejournal.com## div[class*="journalpromo"] + div.hr
youtube.com## div.video-ads, div#header > div#video-masthead
! Auto.ru
auto.ru## div.search-controller__content > div.stat
auto.ru## div.sidebar__block:not(.specials-sales-wrap)
! Yandex
yandex.ru## div.content__left > div.misspell
! Yandex Images
yandex.ru## div.footer > div.distro
!--------------------Restoring (unblock) iframes--------------------------------!
~2gis.ru## iframe#intercom-frame, iframe.chat__containerIframe
~codepen.io## iframe[src*="/s.codepen.io/boomerang/"]
~life.ru## iframe[src*="/embed.life.ru/video/"]
! https://addons.mozilla.org/ru/firefox/addon/542220/
~avito.ru,~drom.ru## iframe[src*="/autoburn.ru/"]
~exist.ru## iframe#tip_f
! Google Mail
~mail.google.com,~youtube.com## iframe[src*="/webchat/"], iframe[src*="/notifications/"], iframe[class="talk-iframe"]
! Google Translate
~translate.google.com,~translate.google.ru## iframe[src*="/translate.googleusercontent.com/"]
! Mail.ru
~deti.mail.ru,~lady.mail.ru## iframe[id^="instagram"]
! Yandex
~yandex.ru## iframe[src*="/mail.yandex.ru/"]
! Yandex Video
~yandex.ru## iframe[aria-label="Video"]
!--------------------Whitelists to fix broken sites-----------------------------!
~2gis.ru## div.mediaPhotoSlider__photos > div._advertiser, div.mediaCard__wrapper > div._type_advertiser
! Auto.ru (all parameters), Yandex Images
~auto.ru,~yandex.ru## div[class*="adv"]
! Google
~google.com,~google.ru## div.gb_sc + div.gb_ga
! Google Mail
~mail.google.com## div[id][class~="gb_ga"], div[aria-label][class~="gb_ga"]
! Mail.ru
~mail.ru## div.js-slider__content
~deti.mail.ru,~lady.mail.ru## div[class*="promo"], div[class*="promo"][data-module]
! Yandex Maps (div.home-panel-content-view__tip)
@@||yabs.yandex.*/count/*$domain=yandex.ru
@@||yabs.yandex.*/resource/*$domain=yandex.ru
